Hi, I am a Ph.D. student in Sociology at the Centre for Research on Social Inequalities (CRIS), Sciences Po, and at the French Institute for Demographic Studies (INED).

I study social inequality: how it is reproduced and how we can help reduce it. Currently, I am investigating how parents’ employment uncertainty affects their children’s development using the French birth cohort Elfe. I am interested in analysing inequality in educational opportunity, labour market, and health outcomes. I am also keen on evaluating the impact of public policies on inequalities throughout the life-course.

You can reach me at marta.facchini@sciencespo.fr
